verses.verse: And I <WG2504>, brethren <WG80>, when I came <WG2064> <WG5631> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>, came <WG2064> <WG5627> not <WG3756> with <WG2596> excellency <WG5247> of speech <WG3056> or <WG2228> of wisdom <WG4678>, declaring <WG2605> <WG5723> unto you <WG5213> the testimony <WG3142> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I determined <WG2919> <WG5656> not <WG3756> to know <WG1492> <WG5760> any thing <WG5100> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, save <WG1508> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> him <WG5126> crucified <WG4717> <WG5772>.

And <WG2532> I <WG1473> was <WG1096> <WG5633> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> weakness <WG769>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> fear <WG5401>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183> trembling <WG5156>.

And <WG2532> my <WG3450> speech <WG3056> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> preaching <WG2782> was not <WG3756> with <WG1722> enticing <WG3981> words <WG3056> of man's <WG442> wisdom <WG4678>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> demonstration <WG585> of the Spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> of power <WG1411>:

That <WG2443> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> should <WG5600> not <WG3361> stand <WG5600> <WG5753> in <WG1722> the wisdom <WG4678> of men <WG444>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Howbeit <WG1161> we speak <WG2980> <WG5719> wisdom <WG4678> among <WG1722> them that are perfect <WG5046>: yet <WG1161> not <WG3756> the wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world <WG165>, nor <WG3761> of the princes <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG165>, that come to nought <WG2673> <WG5746>:

But <WG235> we speak <WG2980> <WG5719> the wisdom <WG4678> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> a mystery <WG3466>, even the hidden <WG613> <WG5772> wisdom, which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> ordained <WG4309> <WG5656> before <WG4253> the world <WG165> unto <WG1519> our <WG2257> glory <WG1391>:

Which <WG3739> none <WG3762> of the princes <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> knew <WG1097> <WG5758>: for <WG1487> <WG1063> had they known <WG1097> <WG5627> it, they <WG302> would <WG4717> not <WG3756> have crucified <WG4717> <WG5656> the YY <WG2962> of glory <WG1391>.

But <WG235> as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, <WG3739> Eye <WG3788> hath <WG1492> not <WG3756> seen <WG1492> <WG5627>, nor <WG2532> <WG3756> ear <WG3775> heard <WG191> <WG5656>, neither <WG2532> <WG3756> have entered <WG305> <WG5627> into <WG1909> the heart <WG2588> of man <WG444>, the things which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath prepared <WG2090> <WG5656> for them that love <WG25> <WG5723> him <WG846>.

But <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath revealed <WG601> <WG5656> them unto us <WG2254> by <WG1223> his <WG846> Spirit <WG4151>: for <WG1063> the Spirit <WG4151> searcheth <WG2045> <WG5719> all things <WG3956>, yea <WG2532>, the deep things <WG899> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> man <WG444> knoweth <WG1492> <WG5758> the things <WG3588> of a man <WG444>, save <WG1508> the spirit <WG4151> of man <WG444> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> him <WG846>? even <WG2532> so <WG3779> the things <WG3588> of 'Elohim <WG2316> knoweth <WG1492> <WG5758> no man <WG3762>, but <WG1508> the Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Which things <WG3739> also <WG2532> we speak <WG2980> <WG5719>, not <WG3756> in <WG1722> the words <WG3056> which man's <WG442> wisdom <WG4678> teacheth <WG1318>, but <WG235> which the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> teacheth <WG1722> <WG1318>; comparing <WG4793> <WG5723> spiritual things <WG4152> with spiritual <WG4152>.

But <WG1161> the natural <WG5591> man <WG444> receiveth <WG1209> <WG5736> not <WG3756> the things <WG3588> of the Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316>: for <WG1063> they are <WG2076> <WG5748> foolishness <WG3472> unto him <WG846>: neither <WG2532> <WG3756> can <WG1410> <WG5736> he know <WG1097> <WG5629> them, because <WG3754> they are spiritually <WG4153> discerned <WG350> <WG5743>.
But <WG1161> he that is spiritual <WG4152> judgeth <WG350> <WG5719> <WG3303> all things <WG3956>, yet <WG1161> he himself <WG846> is judged <WG350> <WG5743> of <WG5259> no man <WG3762>.
